mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.PROD_NO, A.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, A.PROD_NAME, A.PRICE, A.DISCOUNT, A.PROD_CONTENT, A.ORIGIN, A.STOCK FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PROD_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM, PROD_NO, PROD_CATEGORY_NO, PROD_NAME, PRICE, DISCOUNT, PROD_CONTENT, ORIGIN, STOCK FROM PRODUCT) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT P.PROD_NO, P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.DISCOUNT, P.PROD_CONTENT, P.ORIGIN, P.STOCK, P.FILESYSTEM, P.PROD_THUMBNAIL, C.PROD_CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PROD_CATEGORY C ON P.PROD_CATEGORY_NO = C.PROD_CATEGORY_NO WHERE P.PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART ( USER_NO, PROD_NO, PROD_CNT) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{prodNo}, #{prodCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO, C.USER_NO, C.PROD_NO, C.PROD_CNT, P.PROD_NAME, P.PRICE, P.STOCK FROM CART C INNER JOIN PRODUCT P ON C.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}
